name: Bac-Man (Alpha)
description:
College project. This is the alpha version so further updates will be made.

This is a 3D Pac-man clone. You play as two slices of bread and collect bacon strips and eggs and avoid the pigs which turn to bacon when the power eggs are consumed. Don't forget the sauce! 

I also added a Retro mode. 

If anyone would like to provide feedback there is a feedback form: https://forms.office.com/r/HkXVWsmX35
